data.title: Climate: Ural Mountains in Russia
data.meta_description: Climate and important cities in Ural Mountains in Russia incl. temperatures, humidity, rain days, sunshine
data.text:
Most important cities in the federal district »Ural Mountains«

Alone 3 major cities with over 800,000 inhabitants are located here. The federal district has a west-east extension of about 1190 km and over 1680 km from north to south.

It consists of the six oblasts Chelyabinsk, Khanty-Mansiyskiy, Kurgan, Sverdlovsk, Tjumen and Yamal-Nenets.

Data basis: German Weather Service, individual values averaged and supplemented by own elements. Data on cities and inhabitants: geonames.org, United Nations Statistics Division and own research.
